MINT_SUBTITLE: Interact with the GoHorse Smart Contract to mint new tokens.
MINT_ERROR_MIN_AMOUNT: Amount must be greater than zero.
MINT_ERROR_FEE_LOADING: Wait for the minting fee to load.
MINT_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: Insufficient balance to cover gas and fee.
ABOUT_WELCOME: Welcome to the chaotic and glorious world of GoHorse!
ABOUT_INTRO: The GOHO token is the digital representation of the GoHorse development philosophy: make it work, no matter how, and celebrate the most... creative solutions.
ABOUT_PHILOSOPHY_ITEM_2: Tests are for the weak (but maybe it's good to have some).
ABOUT_PHILOSOPHY_ITEM_3: A well-done kludge is a misunderstood work of art.
ABOUT_PHILOSOPHY_ITEM_4: If it works, don't touch it (until it breaks spectacularly).
ABOUT_TOKEN_USE: Use GOHO to reward heroic GoHorse programming feats, participate in meaningless votes, or simply hoard it as a trophy of your own battles in the code.
ABOUT_TOKEN_DISCLAIMER: Remember: This token is for fun and learning purposes, inspired by Brazilian dev culture. It has no real financial value (unless you find another GoHorse enthusiast willing to trade it for coffee).
DOCS_ERROR: Could not fetch all token information or the data is invalid.
DOCS_ERROR_UNEXPECTED: An unexpected error occurred while fetching information.
